Unit test class for verifying the functionality of the AppEnd command.

[TestClass]
public class AppEndTests

object.ToString()

Remarks

This class contains tests to ensure the correct behavior of the AppEnd command, which is responsible for handling the termination of commands or loops within a stored program. It validates the integration of AppEnd with the StoredProgram and Canvas.

Methods

Tests the Compile method for an "if" control flow block.

Initializes the test environment before each test method is run.

[TestInitialize]

Remarks

Sets up a new instance of the StoredProgram and initializes the AppEnd command to ensure consistent and isolated test scenarios.
